- [Tier 2 Application form](https://duke.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_bmvqDdmb5s0e8yq)

- Tier 2 Application deadline: July 21st


## Evaluation

You will receive a Qualtrics survey for post-bootcamp evaluation.
Please fill it out.

## Payments Processing 

Once you fill out the evaluation, it will trigger the finance team regarding the payment. 

If you run into any issues regarding payment, please contact Lisa Stieler <lstieler@ics.uci.edu> and CC Mine Dogucu <mdogucu@uci.edu>

## Next-Year

Please share the [program website](https://www.stat.uci.edu/bayes-bats/) with your colleagues and help us recruit if you can.


## Acknowledgement 

We have been extremely grateful for receiving funding from the National Science Foundation.

If you happen to use any of your products that is a result of this bootcamp/program, we would greatly appreciate it if you can use something similar to following as a form of acknowledgement:

> An earlier version of this activity/manuscript was designed at the Bayes BATS bootcamp funded by the National Science Foundation with award numbers 2215879, 2215920, and 2215709.


We would also like to know about it and would appreciate it if you can let us know about it on this [Google Form]().


## Please keep in touch 


Please keep in touch on Slack. We would love to hear your experiences of teaching/using Bayesian methods.


## 


We would also like to "see" you at the free webinars of [Section on Bayesian Education Research and Practice (BERaP)](https://berap-isba.github.io/events.html) of [The International Society for Bayesian Analysis ](https://bayesian.org/).
